UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents the publicly visible and privately owned data for a user in the application.

id.description: The user's unique ID (matches Firebase Auth UID).

email.description: User's email address. Should only be visible to the user themselves.

username.description: The public username for the user.

userCode.description: A unique, shareable code for users to find each other (e.g., username#1234).

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's avatar image.

online.description: Indicates if the user is currently online.

lastSeen.description: Timestamp of when the user was last active.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was last updated.

UserDirectory.title: User Directory
UserDirectory.description: A simplified, publicly queryable list of users for search purposes.

userCode.description: The user's unique, searchable code (e.g., username#1234).

searchableTerms.description: A list of lowercase terms for searching, including username and parts of the full name.

ChatRequest.title: Chat Request
ChatRequest.description: Represents a request from one user to start a chat with another.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a communication chat, which can be a public group, a private group, or a direct message (DM).

description.description: A brief description of the chat's purpose.

isPublic.description: If true, the chat is discoverable. If false, it's private.

isDM.description: If true, this chat is a direct message between two or more users.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns and manages the chat.

members.description: An array of user UIDs who are members of this chat. Used for security rules.

companionIds.description: An array of AI Companion IDs who are members of this chat.

automations.description: Configuration for any AI automations for this chat.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: A single message within a chat.

authorId.description: The UID of the user or companion who sent the message.

content.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: The server timestamp when the message was sent.

readStatus.description: Indicates if the message has been read by recipients.

reactions.description: A list of reactions to the message.

Companion.title: AI Companion
Companion.description: Represents a configurable AI agent that can participate in chats.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores all user profile data. Each user's document is protected, and the collection can only be queried on indexed fields like 'userCode'.

/userDirectory/{userId}.description: A simplified, publicly queryable list of users for search purposes.

/users/{userId}/chatRequests/{requestId}.description: Stores incoming chat requests for a user.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Stores data for all chats. Access is controlled by the `members` array in each document.

/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores all messages for a given chat. Access permissions are inherited from the parent chat.

/companions/{companionId}.description: Stores configuration for user-created AI companions.
